message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $120 for the item. This price reflects not only the cost but also the perceived value it holds for you. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product to me. However, $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending at this time. I'm willing to pay $100 for it. Would you be open to that?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to accommodate your budget. However, given the cost and value of the product, I cannot lower the price below $110. This price reflects the quality and benefits the product offers. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
